original_text: There is none holy as the Lord: for there is none beside thee: neither is there any rock like our God.
korean_text: 여호와와 같이 거룩하신 이가 없으시니 이는 주 밖에 다른 이가 없고 우리 하나님 같은 반석도 없으심이니이다

sentences.original_text: There is none holy as the Lord
for there is none beside thee
neither is there any rock like our God
